lootr.message.should_sneak: Smashin dis magic goody box will nope da thingies inside! IF u rly wanna go thru w dis, prepare to pounce b4 bonking.
lootr.message.should_sneak2: Goodies be doin %s, dont scretch unless u must.
lootr.message.cart_should_sneak: Skratch da cart and all the magic items will go bye-bye! Tip-toe to break.
lootr.message.cannot_break: Cat cant break special boxy ting.
lootr.message.cannot_break_sneak: Onli magical flyin cats can sneek-skretch.
lootr.message.decayed: O NOES, MAGIK BOX GOT THANOS'D!
lootr.message.decay_in: Hurry hurry, looty ting goes awae in %s secs.
lootr.message.decay_start: Uh oh, u touch box and now it turnin to litter box stuffs! It will b no more %s tiny mins.
lootr.message.refresh_in: More magic tings comin in %s mini mins.
lootr.message.invalid_table: Teh majik list ov itemz [%s] had nuffin in it an' culdnt fill da boxy. Luuk in `latest.log` fur oopsies.
lootr.message.invalid_block: Dis blok dont know wut it is, so it gots no loots.
lootr.commands.usage: /lootr barrel | barrel <loot-table> | chest | chest <loot-table> | cart | cart <loot-table> | shulker | shulker <loot-table> | convert | custom <id> | refresh | decay
lootr.commands.create: Maed uh Lootr %s @ %s uzin da loot-y lizt %s.
lootr.commands.summon: Mejik'd a Lootr rolli boi @ %s w da lootz uv %s.

lootr.advancements.100loot.title: scent-enneal
lootr.advancements.100loot.description: Peek into 100 fresh, per-kat majik boxz and get da tingiez!
lootr.advancements.50loot.title: Pente....wut da meownter?
lootr.advancements.50loot.description: Luk intu 50 new, per-kat warpy boxz and get da stuffs!
lootr.advancements.25loot.title: Neer 1/4's
lootr.advancements.25loot.description: Opun 25 lootable, per-kat megic cat seets and get teh itemz!
lootr.advancements.10loot.title: 10 boxes, lesgo!
lootr.advancements.10loot.description: Sneaky into 10 instuns'd, per-kat luut tings and get da stuff!
lootr.advancements.1chest.title: 'X' Marks da Spot
lootr.advancements.1chest.description: Get ur furst per-kat majik boxy and get da itemies!
lootr.advancements.1barrel.title: Fishee Bootee
lootr.advancements.1barrel.description: Pounce into da majic, per-kat fish box and profit!
lootr.advancements.1cart.title: Rollin Goodiez
lootr.advancements.1cart.description: Hop intu a special, per-kat majikul minecat and get da old miner's stuffs!
lootr.advancements.1shulker.title: Spoopy Box
lootr.advancements.1shulker.description: Find ur first mejikul, per-kat bloopy box and get teh itemies inside!
lootr.advancements.social.title: Not Anti-Social Loot!
lootr.advancements.social.description: Get ur paws on ol da speshul, per-kat mejik boks'z in da HOOOLE wide wurld!
lootr.advancements.root.title: Beelongz in da Old Dusty Place
lootr.advancements.root.description: Invite da majikel, per-kat lute boksies intu dis place.

lootr.advancements.1337loot.description: Peek into at leest 1337 boxez! Wow!
